programme.title: Cartman facilita a paz mundial com sua última brincadeira, o que leva os líderes religiosos a South Park para testemunhar o acontecimento de uma profecia bíblica.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle não entende por que Ike e seus amigos querem ver as pessoas comentar sobre coisas acontecendo, em vez de experimentá-la por si mesmos. Enquanto isso, Randy tem que apresentar ao vivo para fazer algum dinheiro.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle ainda está pertubado pois Ike e seus amigos o chamam de vovó. Enquanto isso, vários hologramas estão à solta em South Park.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman se considera um critico de restaurante on-line em South Park, e vai visitar o restaurante dos novos moradores da cidade.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Heidi Turner quer iniciar uma dieta vegana com Eric Cartman, enquanto Kyle quer saber o motivo pelo qual ele ainda está com ela. Neste mesmo capítulo, veja como a popularidade do presidente diminui cada dia mais.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O diretor PC começa a nutrir sentimentos amorosos pela vice-diretora da escola. Terrance e Phillip querem assinar um contrato com a Netflix e Kyle está cansado de ser humilhado por Heidi e Cartman.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A mãe de Kyle faz um transplante fecal e os meninos recebem a missão de pegar o melhor microbioma.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes querem se destacar na aula de genética para irritar Terrance e estão tentando fazer um cruzamento entre o elefante de Kyle com a porca do Cartman, "Fofa".
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Um elefante faz amor com um porco

programme.title: Kyle está se sentindo só por ser judio. Fora isso, ninguém acredita nele quando ele tenta convercer os cidadãos de South Park sobre a existência de Mr.Hankey, o cocô do Natal.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Sr. Hankey, o Poo de Natal

programme.title: Uma Pistola para Ringo, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Após assaltar o banco local, uma gangue liderada pelo cruel Sancho se refugia em uma fazenda tomando como reféns seus habitantes.

programme.title: Quando Explode a Vingança, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Juan Miranda é um camponês rude com coração de Robin Hood. Sean Mallory é um revolucionário irlandês que é especialista em dinamite e vive agora no México.

programme.title: Django, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Um pistoleiro carregando um caixão, entra em uma cidade que tem duas facções em guerra, o KKK e uma gangue de bandidos mexicanos. Esse é Django e ele se envolve em uma luta contra os dois lados.

programme.title: Keoma, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Ao final da Guerra Civil Americana, um pistoleiro mestiço, cansado de fazer da morte um meio de vida, retorna para aquilo que um dia costumava ser seu lar.

programme.title: O Homem Que Luta Só, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: Ben Brigade, caçador de recompensas, captura o valioso pistoleiro Billy John e segue para Santa Cruz, onde o entregará às autoridades e receberá o prêmio.

programme.title: A Taberna dos Proscritos, (1954, Western)
programme.desc: Zona Libre é um pequeno enclave do outro lado do rio da América. Governado despoticamente pelo General Calleja, oferece refúgio aos bandidos, a um preço.

programme.title: No Rastro da Morte, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Cowan procura pelo seu amigo de infância Catlow, mas revela-se que Cowan é um oficial de polícia e a relação entre ambos não será nada fácil. Catlow é um ladrão, que junto com seus homens, reuniu gado sem marcar e planeja vendê-lo em Abilene.

programme.title: O Céu Mandou Alguém, (1948, Western)
programme.desc: Após mais um assalto, três ladrões de banco fogem rumo ao deserto. Perseguidos pelo xerife Buck Sweet, eles encontram uma mulher no meio do nada.

programme.title: Por uns Dólares a Mais, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Monco é um astuto caçador de recompensas, que perambula pelas cidades do velho oeste americano em busca de um novo alvo.

programme.title: Crimes Obscuros, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: O policial Tadek investiga um caso de assassinato não resolvido e encontra semelhanças do crime em um livro do artista polonês Krystov Kozlow. Ele começa a investigar a vida do escritor e da sua namorada, uma mulher misteriosa que trabalha num sex club.

programme.title: Infectados, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Após perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporação militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: A Maldição do Titanic, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: 110 anos após um dos maiores desastres da história, Titanic III faz sua viagem inaugural até os destroços do navio original. Mas forças sombrias das profundezas do oceano aterrorizam os tripulantes e ameaçam repetir a história.

programme.title: Incisões Perigosas, (2020, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: A blogueira de beleza Alexa Landry só tinha um medo: a cirurgia plástica. Quando ela é sequestrada com seus amigos pelo Dr. Cunningham, um cirurgião plástico perturbado, obcecado em embelezar suas vítimas, seu maior medo se torna realidade.

programme.title: 100 Dias de Resistencia, (2017, War Drama)
programme.desc: Zilan, uma jovem, retorna à sua cidade natal em busca dos vestígios de seu irmão morto, assassinado pelo Estado Islâmico.

programme.title: A Cura de Todo Mal, (1949, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Johnny é um carismático pregador, que viaja ao lado de sua namorada por todos os Estados Unidos, visitando igrejas e enganando as pessoas ao dizer que possui poderes de cura, até o dia em que ele descobre que os seus poderes são reais.

programme.title: Como assaltar um banco, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Ruggero é um homem tranquilo, mas impulsivamente decide roubar um banco para provar que é corajoso o suficiente para sua ex-mulher, que o abandonou.

programme.title: Crimes Obscuros, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: O policial Tadek investiga um caso de assassinato não resolvido e encontra semelhanças do crime em um livro do artista polonês Krystov Kozlow. Ele começa a investigar a vida do escritor e da sua namorada, uma mulher misteriosa que trabalha num sex club.

programme.title: Infectados, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Após perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporação militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: A Última Viagem, (2019, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Uma confusão fatídica em um voo de Nova York para a Irlanda tem consequências complicadas para Daniel Murphy.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 6 Cabeças, (2018, Creature Features)
programme.desc: O que deveria ser um acampamento de treinamento de casamento em uma ilha remota se transforma no teste final de sobrevivência quando um tubarão de 6 cabeças começa a atacar a Praia.

programme.title: V/H/S, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo de criminosos é contratado para recuperar uma fita de vídeo. À medida que eles buscam em pilhas de fitas VHS o vídeo certo, eles se deparam com um número aparentemente interminável de vídeos assustadores, cada um mais estranho que o último.

programme.title: A Invasão Zumbi, (2013, Zombies)
programme.desc: Quando zumbis tomam conta de São Francisco, um grupo desesperado sobrevive trancando-se dentro da prisão de Alcatraz. Quando os mortos-vivos violam a ilha, nossos heróis são forçados a retornar ao continente invadido pelos mortos-vivos.

programme.title: Ataque do Tubarão Mutante, (2011, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um tubarão gigante afunda um barco-escola em alto-mar. Sobreviventes do bizarro desastre refugiam-se em um atol, mas quando a maré começa a subir, o tubarão mutante de duas cabeças ressurge e ninguém está a salvo da fera voraz.

programme.title: Nazistas no Centro da Terra, (2012, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Pesquisadores na Antártica são sequestrados por uma equipe de tropas mascaradas. Eles são arrastados no subsolo para um continente escondido no centro da terra.

programme.title: V/H/S - Viral, (2012, Zombies)
programme.desc: Em busca da fama na internet, um grupo de adolescentes começa a filmar fenômenos estranhos. Mas eles não sabem que só conseguirão a atenção desejada quando forem protagonistas de acontecimentos sobrenaturais e sangrentos.

programme.title: O Trevo Vermelho, (2012, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um duende malvado que foi aprisionado nas raízes de um velho carvalho é acidentalmente solto no Dia de São Patrício. Uma vez livre, ele realiza sua vingança sangrenta contra as pessoas que originalmente o aprisionaram.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 6 Cabeças, (2018, Creature Features)
programme.desc: O que deveria ser um acampamento de treinamento de casamento em uma ilha remota se transforma no teste final de sobrevivência quando um tubarão de 6 cabeças começa a atacar a Praia.

programme.title: V/H/S, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo de criminosos é contratado para recuperar uma fita de vídeo. À medida que eles buscam em pilhas de fitas VHS o vídeo certo, eles se deparam com um número aparentemente interminável de vídeos assustadores, cada um mais estranho que o último.

programme.title: Nazistas no Centro da Terra, (2012, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Pesquisadores na Antártica são sequestrados por uma equipe de tropas mascaradas. Eles são arrastados no subsolo para um continente escondido no centro da terra.

programme.title: Agome, Mirok e Sango pararam de respirar. Inuyasha procura pelo Exército dos Sete para vingá-los. Ele vê Sesshomaru e se certifica de que é uma ilusão.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo se aproximam da luz de um fragmento da Jóia que parece pertencer ao Exército, mas a luz não emana energia maligna. Suikotsu, um bom médico é o dono do fragmento...
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A personalidade má de Suikotsu desperta e luta contra Inuyasha. Quando as crianças o chamam para voltar a ser quem ele era, Suikotsu sente uma forte dor. Bankotsu decidiu retirar-se da vila.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Há uma barreira ao redor do Monte Hakurei que purifica os youkais ou qualquer coisa maligna. Inuyasha e os outros pensam que Narak não pode estar se escondendo no Monte e vão procurar uma pista diferente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Líder do Exército dos Sete! Bankotsu Entra em Cena

programme.title: A batalha entre Bankotsu e Inuyasha começa. Enquanto isso, Sesshomaru chega ao Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Há uma ilha sagrada em um lago cercado por névoa. Hakushin, que se tornou um Buda vivo há cem anos, é venerado lá. Mas algo estranho acontece. O pai de um garoto chamado Shintaro vai investigar, mas ele não volta.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Barreira Energética da Ilha Hijiri

programme.title: Bankotsu sequestra Agome e os outros envolvidos em sua batalha contra Inuyasha. Inuyasha está fica irritado por ver que seus amigos estão se machucando.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Topo Sagrado e o Segredo da Múmia

programme.title: A barreira sagrada de Monte Hakurei impede que os youkais entrem nele. Hakushin ajuda Narak e coloca a barreira.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Monte Hakurei fica mais forte, e Kikyo é impedida de entrar em seu solo sagrado. Kikyo deixa a aldeia de Chiyo, mas vai atrás do Bankotsu para ver o que o Exército dos Sete está fazendo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Suikotsu não pode matar Chiyo e os outros. Após isso, Suikotsu e Jakotsu vão para dentro do local sagrado e esperam por Sesshomaru.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Ginkotsu morre e Renkotsu usa seu fragmento sem permissão. Ao fazê-lo, ele traiu Bankotsu. Ele deseja ainda mais poder e ataca Kuga para que ele possa pegar os fragmentos da Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O mal dentro do Monte Hakurei são os youkais de Narak. Mirok arrisca sua vida para salvar Sango e suga todos os youkais com seu ataque junto com os insetos venenosos e entra em colapso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Mirok e Sango ficam cara a cara com a múmia de Hakushin no Monte Hakurei. O santo diz a eles o motivo de ajudar Narak.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha recupera seus poderes, derrota Jakotsu e se apressa para o Monte Hakurei. Renkotsu tem sentimentos rebeldes em relação ao Bankotsu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A barreira do Monte Hakurei desaparece e Inuyasha está preocupado com a Agome, que vai para o Monte com Kuga e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo e Sesshomaru sentiram que algo estranho aconteceu em diferentes locais.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Batalha Decisiva! O Último e Mais Forte dos Guerreiros Zumbis

programme.title: Mirok e Sango veem um misterioso pedaço de carne nas profundezas do Monte Hakurei. Sesshomaru e Kikyo sentem algo estranho acontecendo em diferentes locais e seguem para o Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Poderosa Banryu; Duelo Mortal no Monte Hakurei

programme.title: Narak ganhou um novo corpo e renasceu. Inuyasha tenta derrotá-lo com seu ataque, mas ele se defende e fere Agome, Mirok e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo vê Kagura escapando do Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O Monte Hakurei é destruído e Kuga acaba caindo, mas Inuyasha o salva. Quando ele se encontra com Agome e os outros, que estão tentando escapar o mais rápido possível, ele vê uma ilusão de Kikyo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha é afastado de seus amigos quando é enganado por informações falsas de que Kikyo ainda está viva. Enquanto isso, Agome e os outros estão em uma certa cidade do castelo e são capturados.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Escuridão do Coração de Agome

programme.title: O bebê de Narak guia Agome para um templo abandonado. Ele ordena que Kagura coloque um fragmento corrompido da Jóia nela, mas Agome recupera a consciência.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Na Era Antiga, Narak encontra um novo youkai para procurar os fragmentos da Jóia. Enquanto isso, Agome retorna aos dias atuais e descobre que sua escola está no meio da preparação para um festival cultural.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: No dia do festival cultural, os youkais que Agome trouxe do Japão feudal são revividos. Eles devoram a comida que Yuka e os outros fizeram.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Youkais Invadem o Festival Cultural

programme.title: Um youkai é revivido e começa a roubar garotas e um jovem procura ajuda de Kaede. Inuyasha tem que derrotar esse novo youkai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Cinco irmãos raposas youkais acreditam que Shippo é um herói. Eles se tornam seus discípulos para aprender sua técnica especial, que na verdade é do Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo se encontram com Shinosuke, que está procurando por sua noiva. Eles são agrupados em uma vila só de mulheres e são separados.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Em uma aldeia onde vivem apenas mulheres, um youkai que foi selado em um pergaminho, é revivido.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Confissão Mais Perigosa de Mirok

programme.title: Uma mulher misteriosa aparece diante de Sesshomaru. Sara foi trazida de volta à vida e roubou a Tessaiga de Inuyasha e transformou Mirok e Sango em estátuas.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Mulher que Amou Sesshomaru: Parte 1

programme.title: Sara pede a Sesshomaru que a destrua junto com o espírito, ele obedece e usa a Tessaiga para destruir Sara junto com o espírito.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Mulher que Amou Sesshomaru: Parte 2

programme.title: Mushin, a pessoa que criou Mirok, vai morrer. Eles perguntam a Mushin o que ele quer para que eles possam lhe dar um último presente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Último Banquete do Mestre Mirok

programme.title: Um youkai invisível que rouba tesouros surgiu. Uma velha que não conseguiu derrotá-lo pede ajuda a Inuyasha e o grupo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Out of Liberty, (2019, Action)

programme.title: Texas Rangers, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: After the Civil War, Texas is at the mercy of murderous bandits. A group of unlikely heroes emerges to battle these renegade outlaws. Out-manned, they summon the courage to protect the innocent put the wrong things right in their beloved homeland.

programme.title: True Grit, (2010, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: True Grit is a powerful story of vengeance and valor set in an unforgiving and unpredictable frontier where justice is simple and mercy is rare.

programme.title: Wild Horses, (2015, Western)
programme.desc: A detective opens up a fifteen-year-old missing persons case and begins to suspect that the boy it belongs to was murdered - and that a local rancher was involved.

programme.title: Lawless, (2012, Drama)
programme.desc: Shia LaBeouf, Tom Hardy, and Jessica Chastain star in this adaptation of 'The Wettest County in the World.' A bootlegging gang make a run for the American Dream during Prohibition.

programme.title: Forsaken (2014), (2016, Action)
programme.desc: In 1872, an embittered gunslinger named John Henry Clayton attempts to make amends with his estranged father, Reverend Samuel Clayton, while their community is besieged by ruthless land-grabbers.

programme.title: Damsel, (2018, Western)
programme.desc: A businessman travels West to join his fiancée in the mountains.

programme.title: True Grit, (2010, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: True Grit is a powerful story of vengeance and valor set in an unforgiving and unpredictable frontier where justice is simple and mercy is rare.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark, (1981, Action)
programme.desc: Get ready for thrills in Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark. Indy and his ex-flame Marion Ravenwood dodge booby-traps, fight Nazis, and stare down snakes in their incredible worldwide quest for the mystical Ark of the Covenant.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire, (1996, Drama)
programme.desc: Jerry Maguire is a sports agent who is brought to a point of crisis in his life when he decides to become an honorable man. Follow his journey to redemption through an unlikely alliance with a female accountant, and his least important client.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mike and Carol have just one week to come up with $20,000 in back taxes, or they’ll lose their house to a neighbor. Even worse, Marcia gets a swollen nose on date night, Cindy’s addicted to tattling, and Jan’s hearing a psychotic inner voice.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October, (1990, Thriller)

programme.title: Clerks, (1994, Comedy)

programme.title: Clerks II, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: A calamity at Dante and Randall's shops sends them looking for new horizons, but they ultimately settle at Mooby's, a fictional Disney-McDonald's-style fast-food empire. Sequel to the 1994 film by Kevin Smith.

programme.title: Clerks III, (2022, Comedy)
programme.desc: Following a massive heart attack, Randal enlists his friends and fellow clerks Dante, Elias, Jay, and Silent Bob to make a movie immortalizing his life at the convenience store that started it all.

programme.title: The Humans, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Based on the Tony Award-winning play, a family gathers for Thanksgiving in their daughter's apartment. Amidst the warmth and humor of the holiday, the tight-knit family tries to hold together in the face of an anxious and uncertain future.

programme.title: Rachel Getting Married, (2008, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: When Kym, returns to the Buchman family home for the wedding of her sister Rachel, she brings a long history of personal crises, family conflict, and tragedy along with her. Rated -R

programme.title: Passengers, (2008, Thriller)

programme.title: Bad Ass, (2012, Action)

programme.title: The Evil Dead, (1983, Horror)

programme.title: The Woods, (2006, Drama)

programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 5

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi's mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole the Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend the Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it's not the power of the cards, but the heart that's in them that counts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of Kaiba Corporation trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game. Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from… Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze. Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea helps him uncover the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi learns that he was a powerful Pharaoh who saved the world five thousand years ago, and he must now save the world again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey is cornered by a group of sinister Rare Hunters who force Joey into a duel. If he loses, the Rare Hunters get his precious Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's time to master new rules and monsters; let the Battle City Tournament commence! In the first duel of the tournament, Yugi challenges the Rare Hunter to win back Joey's Red-Eyes Black Dragon.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 1 - Battle City Begins

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter's strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it's too late to stop him. The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 2 - Up Against Exodia

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The psychic duelist Espa Roba defeats Rex Raptor as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Joey's next on his hit list. What chance does Joey have when Espa Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Joey's hand?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey discovers that Espa Roba's extrasensory perception was a hoax, that he's not yet free from Espa's mental manipulations.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world's most lethal dueling arena where the loser gets sent to the Shadow Realm. Yugi must win this duel or he'll lose much more than his Dark Magician.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up as long as he believes in the heart of the cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: the Dark Magician Girl!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes. Will Weevil's royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: Gecko Moria's minions struggle with the burden of feeding a giant zombie brought to life by Luffy's shadow. Meanwhile, Brook flashes back to a battle that almost cost him his beloved afro!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A BELIEF WORTH BEGGING TO LIVE FOR!! BROOK DEFENDS HIS AFRO

programme.title: The freshly-revived trio of Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji discover that their shadows are missing, and Franky relates Brook's story about a promise he made to a very special whale!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A MAN'S PROMISE NEVER DIES!! TO THE FRIEND WAITING UNDER THE DISTANT SKY

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats flash back to the heartbreaking story of Laboon the abandoned whale, and Brook's battle with the zombie samurai reveals the reason behind his intense afro love!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I SWEAR TO GO SEE HIM!! BROOK AND THE CAPE OF PROMISE

programme.title: Luffy sets out to regain his shadow and convince Brook to join the crew. Meanwhile, Sanji races to stop Nami's zombie wedding before it's too late!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FOOD, NAMI AND SHADOWS!! LUFFY'S ENRAGED COUNTERATTACK

programme.title: Usopp's naturally negative personality makes him the only Straw Hat who stands a chance against Perona's depressing army of ghosts, and Chopper prepares to do battle against his hero, Dr. Hogback!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: USOPP'S THE STRONGEST? LEAVE ANYTHING NEGATIVE TO HIM

programme.title: When Brook is overmatched by the zombie samurai, Zoro steps in to help the skeleton get his shadow back. Meanwhile, Luffy prepares for a battle with Gecko Moria, and Sanji interrupts an undead wedding!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE GENERAL ZOMBIES ARE DOWN IN A FLASH!! OARS FEELS LIKE AN ADVENTURE!!

programme.title: Despite his furious attempts, Luffy struggles to land a blow against Gecko Moria, but Sanji fares much better in his passionate attempt to defeat Nami's beastly abductor!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BLAZING KNIGHT SANJI!! KICK DOWN THE FAKE WEDDING

programme.title: Sanji takes a beating when his opponent suddenly turns invisible, Luffy finally manages to land a blow in his battle with Gecko Moria, and Usopp uses fire to ward off a zombie bear!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A CLEAR-CLEAR HISTORY? SANJI'S STOLEN DREAM

programme.title: After getting the stuffing beat out of him by a zombie teddy bear, Usopp summons his sharp-shooting alter ego to help him discover the secret to defeating Perona!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SAVE ME, HERO!! MY ENEMY IS THE IMMORTAL PRINCESS

programme.title: Usopp reaches deep into his devious bag of tricks to even the odds in his battle with Perona. Meanwhile, Luffy can't lay a finger on Gecko Moria, and a zombie is less than gentlemanly in his battle with Robin!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: PERONA IS TERRIFIED!! USOPP AND UNTRUTHFUL SHARE THE SAME "U"

programme.title: While Franky and Brook watch in awe, Zorro and the zombie samurai wage a sword-slinging battle the likes of which the world has never seen before!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SLASHES DANCING ON THE ROOFTOP!! SHOWDOWN: ZORO VS. RYUMA

programme.title: Chopper can no longer contain his fury over Dr. Hogback's evil treatment of his zombie slaves. Meanwhile, Luffy prepares to face the zombie who's wearing his shadow!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: CHOPPER IS FURIOUS!! HOGBACK'S EVIL MEDICAL PRACTICES

programme.title: Moria's mansion is reduced to ruins as the zombie with Luffy's shadow stalks the Straw Hats! As the walls come tumbling down, Chopper puts the hurt on Hogback, and Nami vanishes right before Sanji's eyes!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: OARS ROARS! COME OUT, STRAW HAT CREW

programme.title: One by one, the Straw Hats attack Oars, but the monstrous zombie appears too powerful to be defeated. Luffy's got his sights set on Moria, but he'd better hurry if he wants to save his crew!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY IS THE ENEMY! THE ULTIMATE ZOMBIE VS. THE STRAW HAT CREW

programme.title: Nami wakes up just in time to find out she's about to marry a zombie, but the special occasion is interrupted by very jealous warthog!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: YOU'RE GOING DOWN, ABSALOM!! NAMI'S LIGHTNING ATTACK OF FRIENDSHIP!!

programme.title: Nami attempts to track down some missing treasure, Brook searches the kitchen for a mystery ingredient, and a heroic team effort topples Oars!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: KNOCK HIM DOWN!! SPECIAL ATTACK: STRAW HAT DOCKING?

programme.title: Nami has a horrifying run in with Bartholomew Kuma, Perona becomes the latest lady to vanish, and Chopper, Franky, and Usopp team up to strike a blow against Oars!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SILENT ASSAULT!! THE MYSTERIOUS VISTOR, "TYRANT" KUMA

programme.title: Kuma has an upsetting message for Moria, Luffy loses track of his intended target, and Zoro attempts to harness the power of a new sword during his battle with Oars!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: OARS + MORIA / THE MOST HEINOUS COMBINATION OF BRAINS AND BRAWN

programme.title: Brook arrives with the salt needed to stop Oars, but the monster shows off some special new abilities. Deep in the forest, Luffy makes some new friends who help him power up!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SECRET PLAN TO TURN THE TABLES / NIGHTMARE LUFFY MAKES HIS APPEARANCE

programme.title: Brook joins the fight as the Straw Hats valiantly try to hold off Oars and Moria until Luffy returns. Unfortunately, even their combined powers are no match for these evil enemies!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE STRAW HAT CREW GETS WIPED OUT / THE SHADOW-SHADOW'S POWERS IN FULL SWING

programme.title: Oars and Moria ruthlessly pummel the badly beaten Straw Hats. The situation looks bleak until the shocking arrival of Nightmare Luffy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE INCREDIBLE BATTLE STARTS! LUFFY VS. LUFFY

programme.title: After Luffy's shadow power disappears, he'll need help from rest of the Straw Hats to land a devastating finishing blow in his battle against Oars.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE END OF THE BATTLE IS NIGH! POUND IN THE FINISHING MOVE

programme.title: Moria gobbles up every shadow in sight to power up for a final showdown with Luffy. Can the Straw Hats save the day before the dawn reduces them all to ashes!?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: OUR BODIES VANISH! THE MORNING SUN SHINES ON THE NIGHTMARISH ISLAND!

programme.title: The battle between Luffy and Moria reaches its epic end, and the gargantuan shadow of the towering brute known as Kuma causes a panic on the island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: NOT OUT OF DANGER YET! ORDERS TO ANNIHILATE THE STRAW HAT CREW

programme.title: Kuma is ordered by the World Government to obliterate every living being on the island, but the Straw Hats – battered as they may be – refuse to go down without a fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: IT REPELS EVERYTHING / KUMA'S PAW-PAW POWER

programme.title: A heated confrontation occurs between Zoro and Sanji as they argue over who will sacrifice themselves to save Luffy, but Kuma's final attack may be worse than death.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE PAIN OF MY CREWMATES IS MY PAIN / ZORO'S DESPERATE FIGHT

programme.title: Sanji learns the truth about Zoro's amazing sacrifice, and Brook is overjoyed to learn that Laboon is still alive and doing fine!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE PROMISE FROM A DISTANT DAY / THE PIRATES' SONG AND A SMALL WHALE

programme.title: A flashback reveals the story of how Laboon and Brook became friends – and the promise that was made at the hour of their sorrowful parting of the ways.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BROOK'S PAST / A SAD FAREWELL WITH HIS CHEERFUL COMRADE

programme.title: Brook remembers the painful loss of his beloved captain, the tragic end to his musical pirate crew, and his lonely days as a skeleton adrift in the shadows.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BINK'S BREW / THE SONG THAT CONNECTS THE PAST WITH THE PRESENT

programme.title: Brook officially signs on as the newest member of the Straw Hats, and Luffy learns that his brother Ace may be in some serious trouble.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A NEW CREWMATE! THE MUSICIAN, HUMMING BROOK

programme.title: The Straw Hats encounter two young girls who are looking for their father, and Luffy has another run in with the devious Captain Foxy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SLOW-SLOW MENACE / "SILVER FOX" FOXY RETURNS

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats attempt to destroy a floating resort in order to reunite two sisters who possess a blueprint for making jewels!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE GREAT SCRAMBLE FOR TREASURE / COLLAPSE! SPA ISLAND

programme.title: Brook struggles to adjust to life among living after so many years alone in the darkness. Can the Straw Hats survive his chaotic attempts to fit in?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BROOK'S GREAT STRUGGLE / IS THE PATH TO BECOMING A TRUE COMRADE RIGOROUS?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A princess of a small Silk Road country has been kidnapped. Lupin and his gang are persuaded to rescue Princess Yasmin in exchange for a stomach full of holy curry meant for the gods. However, the kidnapping was a trap to lure Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Here comes Beauty, the assassin hired by ICPO Headquarters to knock off Lupin! Overwhelmed by Beauty's powerful DumDum bullets, Lupin narrowly escapes with his life thanks to Jigen's quick thinking.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang head to the isolated country of Kimasan, after hearing the country possesses mountains of treasure. They sneak across the border but are quickly captured by Kinkaku and Ginkaku, the giants who rule the country.
programme.sub-title: Lupin's Great Journey to the West

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Casino Paradise is an artificial island owned and operated by Domino, a casino tycoon. Domino decides to run for President and brags that with $500 million to spend, the only way he can lose is if Lupin steals his campaign funds!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Political fixer Pomade Jaws trusts no one, not even his wife Laura. He's stored the scandalous secrets of various world leaders inside a voice-activated safe.
programme.sub-title: The Woman Pops Fell in Love With

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin, Jigen and Goemon have turned themselves in to the FBI, but it's all part of the plan. Their real goal is to break out old man Clyde Barlow, who was once known as a genius bank robber, to get his help with their heist of the National Super Bank.
programme.sub-title: A Classical Thief and a Myna

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Isamu Kondo III, grandson of the leader of the Shinsengumi, hires Lupin and his gang to recover a golden cannon sunk by the Shogunate forces in the Tsugaru Strait. After much effort, the valuable golden cannon is finally recovered from the deep ocean.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Ellery Queen, the owner of the legendary sapphire called "The Eye of Solomon," is also the owner of a football team. Lupin, coming for the sapphire as announced, discovers Queen on the brink of death.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The 3rd Thieves Olympic is about to be held in Japan, and Lupin and Jigen are in it to win it! After winning the first and second Thieves Olympic, if they also win this year's getaway race, they'll become the first-ever Triple-Crown winners!
programme.sub-title: Through the Flowers or Storms, The Thieves Race

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The world's largest diamond has been discovered in South Africa and Lupin has his eyes on the prize. But as it turns out, stealing it is the easy part!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko decides to marry Huffner for his jewelry collection, disregarding the rumor that Huffner's brides always die a mysterious death within a few weeks of their wedding. Turns out, he's also a collector of brides and likes them permanently preserved!
programme.sub-title: A Wedding Dress Doesn't Suit Fujiko

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Jigen receives a letter from Sister Angelica and heads to the African country of Borodias. Sister Angelica wants Jigen's help to rescue Dr. Othello, the leader of the country's independence movement.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The ICPO tries a different approach to capturing Lupin: Astrology. It enlists the help of Marianne, a clairvoyant who can read Lupin's actions using astrological predictions and her crystal ball.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko calls Lupin from Professor Pot's lab, but since Lupin is half-asleep, Jigen takes the call instead. Fujiko claims Professor Pot has accidentally invented a robot that manufactures diamonds, but Jigen doesn't believe a word she says and hangs up.
programme.sub-title: Diamon's Shining in the Robot's Eye

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko has invited Lupin and company to a classical concert conducted by Kyoransky from the International Philharmonic. After they get a good look at Kyoransky's baton, studded with a a diamond worth at least 200 million yen.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin goes to prison intent on making Silver tell what he did with the loot, only to discover that a new top-of-the-line prison was built over the site where he hid the money. Will the operation to trade an execution for the recovery of the money succeed?
programme.sub-title: The Last Gift in Prison is Cup Ramen

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the Golden Bell, symbol of the monarchy of Beltenberg and precious tourist attraction. However, the bell that sparkles in the belfry is just a brass replica.
programme.sub-title: Fujiko, Men are A Sorry Lot!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Zenigata is taken hostage from ICPO headquarters. The terrorists demand to swap him with their boss Napoleon XI, but ICPO refuses. Since Zenigata is no further use to them, the terrorists are bound to kill him; but Lupin is to the rescue?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Smith Gang hit-man company was once the best in the business, but they're suffering now from tough competition. Though the company chairman Smith considers running TV ads to revive his business, he can't think of a good way to do it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though Joe Spade was once a formidable hitman of renown and Jigen's sharpshooter coach, he now comes to beg for Jigen's help; he had gotten old, flubbed a hit contract, and is now on the run.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: ICPO Bureau Chief Jasmine is an able commissioner. She uses the governor to spur Zenigata into action, as she has a secret plan to arrest Lupin. But Jasmine's plan is to make this mission her very last at ICPO so she could get married.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Nightlight Mask murdered the Duke of Le Mond and stole his diamonds. ICPO is having trouble solving the case, so they induct mystery author Conan Dorill as a special inspector. Dorill deduces that the true identity of Nightlight Mask is Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On a night of thunder and rain, a man gives Lupin a doll. The next day there is a news report that a diamond called the Phoenix's Tear had been stolen. Lupin's been caught on security cameras, but he has no recollection of having done the deed.
programme.sub-title: When the Devil Calls to Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin's target is the Vatican Crown, located at the North Pole. He devises a plan to thwart pesky Fujiko, which is to relocate penguins at the South Pole to the North Pole.
programme.sub-title: Lupin's North Pole, South Pole Adventures

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The World Crime Prevention Devices Association has developed the "killer safe" that sent many safe crackers to their graves. But Lupin takes the challenge to steal what it guards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin crashes crime boss Markane's masquerade party, but the party was just a ruse to entrap Lupin. Lupin gets hung by rope in the dark and is made the target of Markane's murder game in ten rounds, of which players have to hit the target.
programme.sub-title: The Badder A Guy, The More Villainous He Is

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin gets called out to New York where he rescues a girl hunted by an organization called Red Spider. Lupin does everything he can to help the poor girl suffering from amnesia; he tries hypnosis on her but to no avail, he gets hypnotized instead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Old man Piccolo had taught Lupin the art of thievery 15 years ago. Learning that his widowed wife had all of her belongings impounded by the police, Lupin promises her to get them all back.
programme.sub-title: The Merry Widow and the Robber's Quartette

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew sneak into Peking's Imperial Palace Museum to steal Emperor Shi's jade Mahjong set, but winds up getting chased by a gang.
programme.sub-title: Operation INVADER at the Great Wall of China

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Look who is flying above New York; it's Superman! All he does is fly around, but the town is in a panic because of his performance. In the meantime, a lot of banks get robbed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin steals a statue called the Stone Child from the Metropolitan Art Museum; he and Fujiko make their getaway in a Cessna, but they crash at the Bermuda Triangle. They encounter a ghost ship at this grave of many ships and planes.
programme.sub-title: From the Ghost Ship with Love

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Foodie and gourmet aficionado Baron Gourmel says he wants to eat Lupin's brain. He claims he'd offer his own 70-million dollar jewelry collection to anyone who could capture Lupin. Fujiko hears of it and informs Lupin right away.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin III learns that his grandfather Arsène Lupin's secret treasures are buried in his grave. Lupin learns of its location with Fujiko's microfilm.

programme.title: Snowpiercer, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The "universal soldiers" must fight the whole army, when the military's supercomputer S.E.T.H gets out of control.

programme.title: The Fifth Element, (1997, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Milla Jovovich, and Gary Oldman star in acclaimed director Luc Besson's outrageous sci-fi adventure, an extravagantly styled tale of good against evil set in an unbelievable twenty-third century world.

programme.title: District 9, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth suddenly find a kindred spirit in a government agent that is exposed to their biotechnology.

programme.title: Moon, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Sam Bell (Sam Rockwell) is nearing the completion of his 3-year-long contract with Lunar Industries, mining Earth's primary source of energy on the dark side of the moon.

programme.title: Brotherhood of the Wolf, (2001, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: In 18th-century France, the Chevalier de Fronsac and his Native American friend Mani are sent to the Gevaudan province at the king's behest to investigate the killings of hundreds by a mysterious beast.

programme.title: Species, (1995, Science fiction)
programme.desc: She's beautiful, seductive, intelligent, and her charms could spell doom for the entire human race! Ben Kingsley, Forrest Whitaker, and Natasha Henstridge star in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi hit.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: Valdez Is Coming, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: In this rousing Western, when a greedy rancher causes the death of an innocent man, former sheriff Bob Valdez (Burt Lancaster) orders him to provide financial support for the widow. But when he refuses, Valdez vows to exact justice at any cost!

programme.title: Vera Cruz, (1954, Western)
programme.desc: In this epic Western, two shady mercenaries (Gary Cooper, Burt Lancaster) in Mexico during the 1866 revolution are hired to escort a Countess and her gold to the Mexican army in Vera Cruz and find themselves at odds with the army…and each other!

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks, (1961, Western)
programme.desc: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California.

programme.title: The Gunfighter, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: A retired gunslinger is forced to strap on his six-shooters once again by the vengeful brothers of a man he killed in self-defense.

programme.title: Fort Yuma, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: When a revered Apache chief is brutally murdered en route to Fort Yuma to negotiate a peace treaty, all-out war erupts in this rousing -- and surprisingly touching -- western starring Peter Graves and directed by the legendary Lesley Selander.

programme.title: God Forgives, I Don't, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: A fast-shooting gunman and an insurance agent track down the murdering robbers of a train hijacking and the stolen money.

programme.title: Back In The Saddle, (1941, Western)
